post:
Our Infrastructure.

Storage 100% Fiber-channel SAN:
HP EVA fiber channel SAN's for our Cloud.
We have a Minimum of 14 SAS Harddrives 15K Per LUN and a max of 14 Per LUN.
(Each Server is GUARANTEED it's own dedicated disk)
Brocade 4GB Redundant Switch Fabric.

Sample Disk Reads:

[root@Server ~]# hdparm -Tt /dev/sda
/dev/sda:
Timing cached reads: 9816 MB in 2.00 seconds = 4914.88 MB/sec
Timing buffered disk reads: 328 MB in 3.02 seconds = 108.62 MB/sec

[root@Server ~]# hdparm -Tt /dev/sda
/dev/sda:
Timing cached reads: 9428 MB in 2.00 seconds = 4718.75 MB/sec
Timing buffered disk reads: 338 MB in 3.01 seconds = 112.32 MB/sec

[root@Server ~]# hdparm -Tt /dev/sda
/dev/sda:
Timing cached reads: 9500 MB in 2.00 seconds = 4756.25 MB/sec
Timing buffered disk reads: 378 MB in 3.02 seconds = 125.25 MB/sec



Server Hardware (no Clones)

Per Server specs:
We use DELL R815 Servers.
Quad 12 Core CPU - 48 Cores Total
256 GB Ram
Redundant network connectivity to multiple Cisco gear.

Server Maintenance:

We perform all our maintenance on our cluster servers with zero interruption to our customers.
Using VMware vmotion and Storage vMotion we can move live running servers from one host node to another with no interruption.

Network 100% Cisco:

Cisco Nexus Switch.
All Virtual Servers have a 1gb Network Connection.
We have a redundant network using BGP to ISP's at 151 Front St in Toronto.

Here are some Sample Pings:

[root@server ~]# ping google.ca
PING google.ca (74.125.226.51) 56(84) bytes of data.
64 bytes from 74.125.226.51: icmp_seq=0 ttl=59 time=0.698 ms
64 bytes from 74.125.226.51: icmp_seq=1 ttl=59 time=1.07 ms
64 bytes from 74.125.226.51: icmp_seq=2 ttl=59 time=0.756 ms
64 bytes from 74.125.226.51: icmp_seq=3 ttl=59 time=1.36 ms


[root@Server ~]# ping rogers.ca
PING rogers.ca (207.245.252.27) 56(84) bytes of data.
64 bytes from 207.245.252.27: icmp_seq=0 ttl=121 time=2.93 ms
64 bytes from 207.245.252.27: icmp_seq=1 ttl=121 time=3.79 ms
64 bytes from 207.245.252.27: icmp_seq=2 ttl=121 time=2.87 ms
64 bytes from 207.245.252.27: icmp_seq=3 ttl=121 time=2.63 ms

Test IP:
199.47.241.1

Server OS Installation:

We can install anything you want on your server.
Our standard instant provisioning servers come with Linux or Windows, You can open a support ticket with the OS you need and we will install it for you.

Support:

Our Support team members are certified in Cisco CCNP, VMware VCP, Redhat RHCE and various Microsoft.
Since we arn't a huge company you can easily pickup the phone and get help instantly.
We are constantly getting praised on the fact that our customers call us and we resolve their issue while on the phone.

Dedicated Firewall Option:

We offer a dedicated Firewall and private vlan for customers that wish vpn to their private server subnet.
This Firewall is 100% operated by you and not shared with any other customer. We can also manage the firewall for you at no charge.

Backup Service:

We offer 2 backup services. Daily Backup and Weekly backup.
This backup will be 2 deep and is a complete server image.
You have access to the backup images and can power on a backup at anytime.
If you have a problem all you have to do is power off your server and power on the backup.
You will be back up and running in minutes like nothing ever happened.


Try it for your self and you will see how our Cloud Servers are the fastest around.
If you would like to test out our servers or would like to resell them in a private label please call or email us.

All our Cloud Servers are running on an ESX Cluster using VMware vSphere 4.
The largest company's in the world use the same architecture we are using.

Server Management Panel.

We use a management panel for you to manage your servers in one place.

You can easily open the console of any server even if there is no network connectivity. you can view resource usage, power on and power off your servers.


FREE Trial

As F9 Servers strives for the best offerings to customers we want to ensure everyone can see how good our services really is. We offer a week FREE Trial. If

you are interested in testing out our services simply enter the Coupon code: 9818 and you will get 1 Week free.

If you whish not continue the service simply cancel the service before the week is up.
